roleset.name: misinterpretation, misconception

role.descr: specific aspect/domain of arg1 that is being misunderstood

roles.note: Arg3 added due to its presence in nominal usage.

example.name: args 1 and 2
example.text: The attraction of Hegel's system for Left and Right thinkers has contributed to its misunderstanding as a philosophical project,

example.name: with args 1 and 3
example.text: Akin has a fundamental scientific misunderstanding of what the morning-after pill actually does.
example.arg: of what the morning-after pill actually does

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, 'misunderstand-v.01', 'understanding.01'. Corresponds to VNcls comprehend-87.2.
